GutGefallen: The symbols were quite clear and the system gave me ample time to react to warnings and such.
NichtGefallen: It was sometimes unclear how to get back into manual driving mode
Verbessern: Maybe separate the button that allows for switching the automation levels up and down, it could be confusing to know if i was currently going up in automation levels or if i was going down
Anmerkungen: I really liked the flashing lights and signal warning, they were quite clear. This was also the first time I ever drove an automated car, so the experience was quite new and I did not fully trust the system at the beginning
SpeechComments: I feel the system that i just used could definitely use more speech outputs, I have the worry that if something happends to the automated driving, such as a limitation ahead, I might be respond to it quick enough without a clear speech output
AllgAnregungen: I really enjoyed the study and it quite fun to drive what felt like a super futuristic car! Only thing I would change is the tightness on the eye tracker.

GutGefallen: After a few try´s, I felt the HMI was extremly reliable. The HMI made the driving experience more comfortable.
NichtGefallen: I felt the HMI was not intuitive and a comfort level needed to be reached into order to be familiar with the controls.
Verbessern: I would like to have a stronger notification system of HMI changes and warnings.
Anmerkungen: Overall a good experience and I would use the HMI on a regular basis when driving. Once I understood how the system worked I would come to rely on it.
SpeechComments: N/A
AllgAnregungen: An enjoayable study. One thing I would like to add is the definition between ''Automated'' and ''Assisted'' driving is still not clear. Deike was a wonderful instructor!

GutGefallen: It was very easy to use, intuitive, and easy to learn. There was not an abundance of options, which made it simple to use on the go.
NichtGefallen: Sometimes it was hard to tell when I switched to automated driving that the car was in control. It might be helpful to have a physical indication (aside from just the display) that the car was driving autonomously.
Verbessern: See above. Otherwise it was great.
Anmerkungen: Nothing more than indicated above or my comments in the car. BMW has a great Navigation interaface vs. their competitors, and I think the design should not drift too far from that.

GutGefallen: Although the symbol for the assisted driving did not make much sense, it was easy to figure out as it was the middle symbol between the 3 which purose it served. Easy to figure out, intuitave, easy to switch between modes and the displays were easy on the eyes/nice to look at.
NichtGefallen: I did not like that there was no sound associated with needing to suddenly switch from automated back to manuel. When something goes wrong in the car, like a sensor or system error, there should be noise/alarm or at the very lease vibration in the steering wheel to notify the driver's attention. If in automated the goal is for the driver to be able to realistically check emails, then they would not be looking constantly at the dashboard for a message to pop up saying that there could be an error and you need to switch back to manual. This feature made no sense to me and seems dangerous, therefore I would not trust using the automated system.
Verbessern: As stated above, there should be a sound or alarm when the driver would need to switch out of automated system to either assisted or manual. Especially is there is a sensor error or emergency braking is needed!
Anmerkungen: It was a little unclear which exact features were included in the assisted system. Intuitively I could feel that it controls acceleration, and at first I thought it took over the steering because I felt an immediate sensation in the steering wheel when I switched to assisted. However, I learned when the message appeared that I needed to keep my hands on the wheel. I wonder still what the other features of assisted driving would be, since I did not partake in switching lanes or anything other than driving straight.
SpeechComments: I think it would be nice to have the voice feature turned off only for notifications of things that are not safety related,, so that a driver could choose their preference. I think however the speech output for when there are errors or you need to switch back to manual from automated concern safety and therefore should not have the option of being turned off. (Like a safety belt alarm ringing when you don't put it on)
AllgAnregungen: Straightforward, easy and enjoyable experience, aside from the eye mask gave me a headache and began hurting and becoming really uncomfortable the last 15 minutes or so of the driving portion. The person assisting me in the experience was very friendly and helpful and made the experience pleasant for me!

GutGefallen: it is very easy to use, I don`t have to learn so much
NichtGefallen: I can´t find anything, that was not good.
Verbessern: A seperate button for assistant driving and one button for automatic driving would be good.
Anmerkungen: The human-machine-interface I used was good. And I like the different colours between the different modes. The system was also easy to handle without a lot of instructions.
SpeechComments: I think, if there any problems like "there is a sensor error", the speech outputs are very important and the driver need it always.
AllgAnregungen: The study and also the assistant driving was very interesting and I find the HMI is a very good thing. I would like to need it at every driving with my car.

GutGefallen: Everything was easy to use
NichtGefallen: I liked everything
Verbessern: Not at the moment
Anmerkungen: No
AllgAnregungen: No, everything went well

GutGefallen: Quick response to setting the modes, and clarity about which mode I am in was very good. The steering feedback that pushes against small human inputs reminds me that it is working and helps build trust.
NichtGefallen: I would need more time with the system to develop more trust of it. If it were fitted to my car, and I had several weeks or months to get used to it, I think I would start to use it more often.
Verbessern: The warning when losing support of automated features needs to be more clear. Especially when one is doing the secondary task, it is very easy to miss all of the warnings indicating that the functionality is going away.
Anmerkungen: A haptic and auditory feedback is necessary to notice the changes in availability, otherwise it is very easy to miss all of the warnings until the system turns itself off
SpeechComments: Depending on how often the system would be forced to switch between modes, I could see that the constant reminders might become annoying but tolerable. It would be better to have constant reminders than not know what is going on with the car.
AllgAnregungen: Looking forward to see how it would impact the future of BMW cars!

GutGefallen: The lights on the steering wheel were a nice touch and not very aggressive. The voice/sound was also good for taking me out of my concentration when I was playing the game.
NichtGefallen: Nothing really
Verbessern: Maybe have the entire interior light up slightly instead of just the steering wheel. If I were to do something that was making me not look anywhere near the steering wheel, having the entire car light up would make sure I got the message.
Anmerkungen: The more I used the automatic driving, the more it felt cumbersome to keep my fingers on the steering wheel in assisted mode, even though its quite relaxed by allowing me to only slightly touch the steering wheel. At the beginning I felt slightly distrustful of the automatic driving and assistance but that went away fairly quickly. I think I would take some time though before trusting it with other cars and people around.
SpeechComments: Speech outputs definitely make it feel more immersive and I think a must have. A nice calming voice is definitely wanted
AllgAnregungen: Cool study. I hope that we can have fully automatic cars at some point, I hate driving long distances!

GutGefallen: I liked how easy it was to toggle between the modes of automatic driving.
NichtGefallen: I wasnt sure how much i could trust the machine or if I could really perform other tasks while in fully automatic mode.
Verbessern: The commands that the machine gives the human should be more alarming
Anmerkungen: I didnt really notice a difference in the assisted driving and the fully automatic driving
SpeechComments: You should be able to customize your speech settings
AllgAnregungen: I wasnt sure if i would be abel to perform tasks (such as emails) while the automated driving feature was on, if I were driving in traffic, instead of a straight road with out hazards.  I think the subject should be made to take turns or drive around cones to better expirence the difference in the three levels of automatic driving.

GutGefallen: Well integrated into the usual car controls
NichtGefallen:
Two buttons instead of one.
I expected to be able to click through all modes with one button instead of activiting the system with one button and changing the mode with another.
Uncertainty about what would happen if I did not follow the system`s instructions, in other words what would happen if I did not take back manual control
Verbessern:
Turn on and cycle through driving modes with one button
More audio tones to indicate changing availability of driving modes
Information about what will happen if the systems instructions are not followed, eg "Car will drive to the right and break to a compete stop"
SpeechComments: I dislike the idea of having to active assisted driving first and then having to switch between assisted and automated driving with a button. That seems unnecessarily complicated.

GutGefallen: I very much enjoyed the automatic driving mode experience! It made being in the car much more pleasant and worthwhile of my time. Assistance is also helpful but I preder automatic every time.
NichtGefallen: I did not like having to look at the screen between all three modes, especially in automatic. For manual and assisted, it is tolerable but for automatic, having to constantly check for warnings or errors made it slightly stressful/unpleasant. I also did not like the absence of audio assistance when changes occurred in modes, either verbal instructions or noise notifications would be helpful.
Verbessern:
There is room for minor improvements, such as: 
- audio notification when modes become available/unavailable 
- less aggressive sound when there is an error. It made me very alarmed whereas specific verbal instructions would be more helpful and less stressful (i.e., human voice saying: there is an error. please turn off automatic driving and turn on manual). 
- I greatly prefer being able to use one button to control all modes and one button for only turning on and off.
SpeechComments: I would really like speech outputs!
AllgAnregungen: A verz pleasant and fun experience :)

GutGefallen: it could be convienient for long rides and driver fatigue.
NichtGefallen: I felt like I couldnt trust the automatic driving because its new to me.
Verbessern: Rearrange the buttons away from the steering wheel. I felt like I could accidently switch between modes or turn off assisted driving.
Anmerkungen: instructions were confusing. I was skeptical relying on automated driving.
SpeechComments: personal speech can grab your attention a lot better than passive.
AllgAnregungen: Automated driving is quite new so I was nervous using the system.

GutGefallen: i found it simple to use and informative as well
NichtGefallen: nothing
Verbessern: maybe a little more alertive when a feature is not available
Anmerkungen: innovation at its best
SpeechComments: My driving instructor speaks super english and seems to have a talent in reading peoples vibration . Very professional with a friendly balance. A good experience it has been.
AllgAnregungen: Salutations to Science and all that she invents

GutGefallen: The colors.
NichtGefallen: Nothing
Verbessern: No
Anmerkungen: No
AllgAnregungen: Enjoyable experience.

GutGefallen: <it was interesting and something new. <i have used assitance before but not automation.
NichtGefallen: <i think it comes down to age. <i felt too nervouse to really engage in other activities during driving but after a while did not mind trying other things during the automated driving
Verbessern: <i felt the buttons were counterintuitive. <why not just have one for automation and one for assited instead of a power on and change in driving levels
Anmerkungen: <it is interesting and it is amazing what we are developing in new vehicles. <<<<<<<<<makes me nervous, however, that people might put too much faith in automation and not pa attention to the road

GutGefallen: I liked the ease in switching from the various modes from assisted toautomated.  Also interesting was the prompt givn when the automated mode was available.  When switching between the modes from manual to the automated mode, the instant switch in vehicle control was swift.  The slight hesitation was felt when the automation mode began.
NichtGefallen: Althought the automation mode is great, the driver cannot become completely engulfed in secondary activities because messages appear on the display panel that may need attention.  Perhaps, paralleling the messages on the display with spoken messages and/or instructions as well.  Additionally, some of the features that the automation mode is capable of performing, such as the emergency brake, may cause harm to the driver if no prior or immediaate verbal warning is given.
Verbessern: Perhaps, paralleling the messages on the display with spoken messages and/or instructions as well.

GutGefallen: <the interface was quick and straightforward
NichtGefallen: it was a little bland. Commparing to Tesla, a lot of similar information is displayed in more attractive ways
Verbessern: displaying the modes and the bottom is space efficient but was difficult to see at times. adding additional visual indicators to the car illustration in the center of the display would be nice. This may also be biased by my previous experience with tesla because thats how they show autopilot availability-
Anmerkungen: im excited to see this feature in production
SpeechComments: Id rather just a short tone. Speech outputs would need to interrupt music-podcasts, etc and i dont want to keep hearing long speech prompts

GutGefallen: I like the variety of features it offers, however at the beginning it can be confusing to use. I was always confused with the names, especially Assisted and Automated, it took me a while to differentiate the two names.
NichtGefallen: I was not very confident in leaving my hands from the wheel, that is because it is something new to me. Also whenever there was an alert, it was a visual message on the dashboard which makes it hard to read if one is not paying attention to the dashboard.
Verbessern: Based on personal experience I would suggest a better visual design, that stands more, simpler to see and whenever there is an alert, there should always be a sound so the driver knows to look at the dashboard.
Anmerkungen: I liked it, it is definitely something I would like to have in the future. Most importantly I think this is something that an individual should be trained on by an expert before using it, to avoid accidents.
SpeechComments: They were clear, and very important to keep them short and clear during driving. Some of the messages in the dashboard were long not easy to read when driving so better when they are availble on speech output or followed by an alert sound.
AllgAnregungen: I found it great, definitely something new for me, I would definitely like this feature on my future vehicle, however this should be a feautre that is somehow people are well trained before using it. Thanks!

GutGefallen: Clear, felt intuitive
NichtGefallen: While it was easz to understand, I expected a can audible onfirmation of sorts when the system was engaged
Verbessern: Slighty brighter color, the blue is fine, but perhaps a bit more contrast
Anmerkungen: Would be interesting to have an audible confirmation as well
AllgAnregungen: none

GutGefallen: The icons and controls were exactly as I expected.  My first try I was able to engage the automated and assisted driving.
NichtGefallen:
I am not sure that the button for turning on and off the system is fully needed.  I could imagine simply using the button to change the automation level between the 3 settings would be enough for me. 

Additionally I felt like the the perfect solution for alerting when a need between automated and manual driving is needed wasn't fully achieved.  In the first scenario there was not enough feedback to tell me that I needed to take over control - I could easily imagine not noticing it in time if I were fully distracted.  The second scenario with the beep was alarming, and made me act immediately, but also with some panic.  I believe I hit the breaks immediately, and perhaps that was not needed or could have even been dangerous if i were in traffic.
Verbessern: I could imagine the entire background color of the control area changing colors - it remained black the entire time and it could have turned blue or green for automated driving and turned red if I needed to take action.  Additionally tactitle notification in the stearing wheel or or seat might be intresting as well.  I found the lights on the stearing wheel to not be bright enough during the day light to be of much use, and perhaps there could have been a larger lighting area on the stearing wheel for this type of feedback.
Anmerkungen: overall I enjoyed the experience.  I think a good HMI will give people comfort when adopting automated driving systems, so I see it as critically important.

GutGefallen: The security of maintaining the car in the middle of the lane.  The pop-up display message to take over or keep my hands on the wheel.
NichtGefallen: There was no noise or it came too slowly when the display had a pop-up message.  I think a little noise would alert the driver to pay full attention to the display.
Verbessern: Just a little beep noise to follow a pop-up display message.
Anmerkungen: I liked it and can see it providing more safety while driving long distances on highway traffic.  Tired drivers tend to have some trouble staying in the middle of a lane and this could help that situation.
SpeechComments: I like the idea of speech outputs and also believe that they should be able to be shut off when the driver does not wish for them to be on.
AllgAnregungen: no.

GutGefallen: It was straightforward and clear.
NichtGefallen: If there was a large sudden obstruction, I would worry that the alert would not be fast enough to trigger my response...and that my response would not be fast enough.
Verbessern: Louder alert when telling the driver to switch from automation to manual - what if the driver had fallen asleep! It sounds crazy but there are those people who can nap at a moment´s notice...
Anmerkungen: No
AllgAnregungen: No

GutGefallen: It was easy to activate the assisted and automatic driving, and the selection took over very quickly. I also liked the display size and the volume of the warnings. Plus, when I need to take over the steering wheel from automatic driving, that there were flashing colors to help direct my attention immediately to what was happeningö I became quite engrossed in the secondary activity and it took my brain a second to transition to what was happening and the lights really helped this. It was also easy to switch between assisted and automatic.
NichtGefallen: The notifications were not up long enough. For example, if I was doing the secondary activity, and really focusing on it like one might with email, then I could miss a notification unless it was an emergency stop.
Verbessern: no
Anmerkungen: I liked it better than I expected to, but it was still hard to turn total control over to the machine.
SpeechComments: Important to have the volume of the speech manually controllable by the user and that the user can disenable if they so choose.
AllgAnregungen: It took a little bit to get use to it but then it was fun. I could not exactly remember what features were available to assissted driving, so to have a reminder available would have been nice.

GutGefallen: i liked that it gives warnings about avaailability and sensor errors
NichtGefallen: no audible souund alerts when the system became unavailable
Verbessern: i would have liked more sound alerts to draw my attention back to the steering wheel if a problem with the system occurs.
SpeechComments: it would be nice to choose the voice... like, maybe Morgan Freeman, or Judy Dench

GutGefallen: Its easzy!
NichtGefallen: Not sure how safe it would be in real life scenarios.
Verbessern: Perhaps use the color red for fully automated or orange so it is very obvious that you are not in control and should take great care.
Anmerkungen: None
SpeechComments: I think it would be beneficial to have the speech output so i can watch the road and do my secondary activity instead of also having to monitor the control panel. Making me have less things to do while in the car. Especially, if I am distracted by children or a spill of coffee ´- voice activation would be ideal to warn me.
AllgAnregungen: None

GutGefallen: It simply helps drivers for long distance.
Verbessern: error message in red should be in a light red color instead of dark red. i had problems reading the error.

GutGefallen: It was very easy to figure out.  easy to turn off just by breaking.
NichtGefallen: I dont know how well it would do in heavy traffic, at night, country roads without markings, rain,  etc.  Difficult to fully trust the system especially if I would be liable for any accidnt.
Verbessern: No, it was already easy to use
Anmerkungen: I wouldnt fully use it unless I had a training course on the automatic driving to know when it could be trusted and when manual driving would be better.
SpeechComments: Too many prompts would be a bit destracting to the driver and would get annoying after a while.
AllgAnregungen: Maybe some small obstacles would make it more realistic.  I dont know how automatic driving would handle cyclists or construction cones, etc. it was fun!

GutGefallen: I liked that there were very few options to choose from to automate my driving, I wasnt overwhelmed with choices that I would have to make which might have been hard when on the road. I like that there were only two buttons to have to think about, and that the colors on the screen were easy to see.
NichtGefallen: Im not sure if I liked that the buttons for automation were so close to buttons that had other functions, it seems like one could accidentally press the automation buttons when they didnt mean to.
Verbessern: no
Anmerkungen: no
SpeechComments: i am definitely not a fan of speech outputs in cars, i find it annoying and interuptive
AllgAnregungen: maybe there could be some type of haptics in the steering wheel to alert changing in levels of automation, like a vibration

GutGefallen: Easy to use after an inital learning period.
NichtGefallen:
The three symbols for the driving modes looked very similar, but their placement let me know which was which - manual on the left and fully automated on the right.  
When the Emergency Brake! command appeared on screen, there was no corresponding alarm or audible warning.
Some notifications on the display console might have been missed if I hadn´t been looking at the screen at the time.
Verbessern:
Different symbols on the steering wheel for the Assisted and Automated driving modes, though I don´t have a suggestion.  I learned that the left button turned on the Assisted mode and that it had to be on before you could activate the second button for Automated mode.
Notifications on the screen could be in a different color, or flash, or something to make them more noticeable.
Anmerkungen: Designers should always remember that many middle aged and older drivers use reading glasses but don´t always wear them when they are driving, so don´t make symbols too small or similar.
SpeechComments: I really like these outputs, but it would nice to be able to turn them off, if desired, in case someone in the car is sleeping, for example.

GutGefallen: It was easy to use. I liked that the different drive options were color coded so I could easily see which drive mode I was in. I appreciated the senors and vibration when I needed to return to the steering wheel.
NichtGefallen: Intuitively I selected the "on" button when I wanted to change instead of the arrow button.
Verbessern: I think "on" and switching back and forth arrow option could be the same button.
Anmerkungen: I found the second image "assisted driving" a little confusing as the hands were lowered on the steering wheel. I was not sure if this meant I could take my hands off the wheel or just rest them below. I think once I knew for sure, I would remember, but in the moment, I was not sure.
SpeechComments: I like speech outputs when I am in danger or need to take action. I do not like them when confirming a choice I have already made.
AllgAnregungen: The study was very professional. I don´t have any suggestions.

GutGefallen: Easy to learn and use.
NichtGefallen: When in automated mode, message to manually brake was only displayed on the dash.  Very easy to miss if one is occupied with a secondary action.  Message would have gone unnoticed.
Verbessern: For important messages-alerts, there should also be an auditory cue to implement message on dash.  This way if driver does not see the dash, she can hear the message instead.
Anmerkungen: It is a great tool for drivers who need to multi-task during driving.  But it still should be used with great caution.
SpeechComments: Speech outputs should be used selectively and only in cases that would help avoid danger or confusion.  Otherwise, they become annoying.  Most functions do just fine with dashboard indicators only.  But some things like needing to swith from Auto to Manual  should defiitely also have a speech output.
AllgAnregungen: Very well organized and accommodating.  The Experiment Leader, Deike, was incredibly gracious and patient.  She made me fell very relaxed and gave clear, easy to understand instructions.  I was a bit nervous when I first arrived, but she put me at ease immediately and made me feel safe and confident.

GutGefallen: I very much liked the automative aspect. It would be a real feat to be able to drive without having the hands on the wheel and being able to participate in secondary tasks such as answering emails and responding to messages.
NichtGefallen: I think it could be a bit more clear about which driving mode one is in. Obviously, it was clear from the bottom of the screen which mode one was in, but since it was progressive, someone might mistake that they are in assisted driving instead of automated driving. Having a voice say something like "You are in automated driving" or "You are in assisted driving" - something that confirms the mode one is in would be good.
Verbessern: Please see my earlier comment.
Anmerkungen: Please see my earlier comment.
SpeechComments: I find being addressed personally by an electrical system as a computer to be creepy, and would much rather be addressed in a passively distanced manner. Otherwise it would be too much like 2001 Space Odyssey in which HAL is addressing the astronauts. I do think that some voice reminders are important, however.
AllgAnregungen: I think that automated driving is a super interesting possibility, and it is intriguing to see how the issue is being explored from a user experience standpoint, but I think that the system needs to be super clear to the driver as to which mode in which they are driving. If it isn´t super clear to the driver that they aren't in one mode or another, that could obviously lead to problems.

GutGefallen: It was very simple to use with clear symbols
NichtGefallen: I felt that I could not trust it entirely as the warnings of when to change automation modes/emergencies were only on the dashboard. I felt that I had to look too often at the dashboard instead of being able to relax a bit in automation mode.
Verbessern: Add sounds/verbal warnings in times when manual control is needed/hazardous situations occur
SpeechComments: Not important for basic availability of automation levels as the driver will be able to simply check the dashboard if they are interesetd in using them, but very important for warnings and changes needed to be performed by the driver.

GutGefallen: The ability to complete a second task. The buttons on the steering wheel were comfortably located as well.
NichtGefallen: I did not and still do not know what the different symbols mean. Also, if there is/was an emergency (z.B. Emergency Brake!), I would expect a sound, vibration in the seat or steering wheel or flashing lights to get my attention.
Verbessern: More information of what the driver can do when each function is available/not available. Additonally, a warning more than on the screen, would be necessary to get my attention. (vibration, or flashing lights, etc.)
Anmerkungen: I did not know what to expect, but this was quite stressful because I wanted to perform well for the experiment. I hope and imagine these results would be different if I were test driving the car at a dealship where an employee would inform me of the HMI and answer my questions.
AllgAnregungen: Thank you for letting me take part, I hope I offered some information.

GutGefallen: It was easy to navigate
NichtGefallen: Messages were short and would disappear. I was not always aware of changes in functions
Verbessern: none
Anmerkungen: none
AllgAnregungen: directions were a bit too long and unclear which caused later confusion with experiment and how i was supposed to interact

GutGefallen: I found it to be very exciting piece of technology.  i thought after a few minutes of learning it was easy to use and very easy to navigate.  It made me want to know more about the full range of things it can do.  I also found it after the first experience of the automated driving part, very safe and settling checking emails or doing other activities, I would say I trusted the vehicle.
NichtGefallen: the initial jerk of the vehicle into the center of the lane is unexpected at first and a little scary but after the first time it is just fine.
Verbessern: maybe a more soft transition of the vehicle into the correct driving position once the automated driving kicks in.
Anmerkungen: I find it exciting, and also helpful.  I think it will help keep people safer in the future on the road
SpeechComments: no
AllgAnregungen: I find this study very interesting, especially in regards to if different age groups are more hesitant to have these features in place.  However, the overall study of showing what is availabe and what the cars can do is very exciting for the future of driving.

GutGefallen: The HMI seemed to be well aware of the lane markings and maintained speed predictably.
NichtGefallen: The HMI asked me as a driver to take control without automatically deactivating the automated driving mode. My instincts as a driver would be ignore the HMI and focus on the road situation ahead from the moment that the HMI asks me to take over, so this is very unpredictable for me, and the car could also appear unpredictable to other drivers if the automated mode is not immediately off.
Verbessern:
When flashing the "emergency brake" warning immediately after asking me as a driver to take over, it was not clear whether I was supposed to apply the brake or whether the car was doing so automatically. In this instance, if the car were to brake and warn me that it was doing so for an obstacle ahead, I would trust the HMI to have seen the obstacle I may not see.

Another area of improvement could be the position of the warnings. The large lane keeping indicator in the middle of the screen did not change when the warnings were issued over the radio portion of the screen, although this is where a drivers eyes may be instinctually drawn. The warnings might fit better in place of the unchanging indicator.
Anmerkungen: Overall the system was quite easy to use. It felt strange for the system to indicate that automated driving was available when I was in manual mode because the system requires switching through assisted mode to get to automated mode. I would expect this to occur only when the driver has requested the vehicle to assist them already, so there is only one switch necessary to get there.

GutGefallen: the technology, its great for certain driving situations!
NichtGefallen: the technology,  Its great for certain driving situations and how it interacts with my style of driving.
Verbessern: I would need to do more testing
Anmerkungen: great job
SpeechComments: no
AllgAnregungen: the testing is great and I loved it but need more senerios to have a better idea of it functions.

GutGefallen: How easy it was to switch between options.
NichtGefallen: That I wasn´t warned one time with sound to change from automated to manual.
Verbessern: Instead of two buttons, just one that cycles through the options would have been more intuitive for me.
Anmerkungen: I would like sound indication as in normal driving I would not look at my dash that often.
AllgAnregungen: Just to add to my comment about one button, it would have been more intuitive for me if the power button simply turned the function on and then I had to toggle to choose a mode. When the power button automatically selects assisted driving, I assume I only need to hit it again to reach automated.

GutGefallen: It was easy to interface with and figure out without much direction.
NichtGefallen: The eye glasses hurt to wear during the test drive after a while.
Verbessern: Improving the eyeglasses would help in comfort of the tester.  The view a slightly obstructed as well.
Anmerkungen: good system
AllgAnregungen: keep up the excellent work!

GutGefallen: The actual usage was very intuitive. Very similar to using cruise control.
NichtGefallen: I feel like the signals could have been more alerting. I felt like I had to constantly be checking the dash to see if I need to take over for the system.
Verbessern: Maybe adding a noise or a blinking light when the system needs to be taken over (due to sensor error or system limit), but not when different options are available. I feel like the current design is simple and efficient as far as the alerting of the different systems being available.
Anmerkungen: I think overall it is a very easy to use and intuitive system! Makes for an exciting and enjoyable experience.
SpeechComments: I think there is a line where it can become annoying so limiting its usage is important in my opinion. So using for when the system must be taken over again or something on that level of importance.
AllgAnregungen: Very well set up and carried out! I enjoyed being able to participate!

GutGefallen: I liked that it was similiar to cruise control on older cars, so it was familiar in a way.
NichtGefallen: That I wasn't sure why the automated driving was or was not available.
Verbessern: When asking the driver to take over, it displayed a graphic, instead of looking outside to the road my eyes were drawn to the graphic.
Anmerkungen: I would rather have clear automation level up and down buttons, instead of just a single button cycling between them. I would want to be confident which way it would go when I pressed it.
SpeechComments: I wouldn't like getting a speech notification when automated driving is available, that would get annoying, since I'd be actively driving I would see the display anyway and not need an audible notification.
AllgAnregungen: I think the element of surprise is good to see how people will react to never having seen such a system before. For example, I had no idea what the symbols on the screen would look like but I was pleasantly surprised to find them intuitive. And the sudden deactivation of automation was good to see how someone would react without previous knowledge of the system.
